text: Linas is a commune. It is in Île-de-France in the Essonne department in north France. In 2020, 6,864 people lived in the commune. The inhabitants are known as Linois. Linas is known for its motor racing circuit Autodrome de Linas- Montlhéry. It has a church called Saint-Merry. == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Mayors of Essonne Association Category:Communes in Essonne
title: Linas, Essonne
